author: Staff Reporter
text:
Deepak (22), a resident of Otteri, died on the spot after a speeding lorry rammed into his car while he was driving back home from work at Kanathur on East Coast Road. The driver Munusamy was arrested. At Tiruninravur, Dhanapal (48), a mason, died after he was hit by a lorry while crossing the road. Investigations were on.

—staff reporter
title: 2 die in accidents
